items.title: Awesome Inertiajs Updates on Sep 07 - Sep 13, 2020
items.summary: 13 awesome projects updated on Sep 07 - Sep 13, 2020
items.content_text:
### Useful Links

*   [Documentation](http://inertiajs.com) - Official website and documentation.
*   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/inertiajs) - Official Twitter account.
*   [Discord](https://discord.gg/gwgxN8Y) - Official Discord server.
*   [Organization](https://github.com/inertiajs) - Official GitHub organization.

### Resources / Presets

*   [Laravel Moonlight (‚≠ê144)](https://github.com/TitasGailius/laravel-moonlight) - Laravel front-end preset with Tailwind CSS, Inertia.js and Vue.js.
*   [Titanium (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/usetitanium/inertia) - Laravel front-end preset with Tailwind CSS, Inertia.js and Vue.js.

### Resources / Packages

*   [Kakunin (‚≠ê39)](https://github.com/Juhlinus/kakunin) - Laravel package for real-time form validation.

### Resources / Articles

*   [Introducing Inertia.js](https://reinink.ca/articles/introducing-inertia-js)
*   [Server-side applications with client-side rendering](https://reinink.ca/articles/server-side-apps-with-client-side-rendering)
*   [Inertia.js and Livewire: a high-level comparison](https://sebastiandedeyne.com/inertia-js-and-livewire-a-high-level-comparison/)
*   [Handling authorization in a Laravel and Inertia.js application](https://sebastiandedeyne.com/handling-authorization-in-a-laravel-and-inertia-application/)
*   [Handling routes in a Laravel and Inertia.js application](https://sebastiandedeyne.com/handling-routes-in-a-laravel-inertia-application/)

### Resources / Examples

*   [Ping CRM / Rails (‚≠ê349)](https://github.com/ledermann/pingcrm) - Demonstration application made with Ruby on Rails and Vue.js.
items.content_html:
Useful Links

  • Documentation - Official website and documentation.
  • Twitter - Official Twitter account.
  • Discord - Official Discord server.
  • Organization - Official GitHub organization.

Resources / Presets

  • Laravel Moonlight (‚≠ê144) - Laravel front-end preset with Tailwind CSS, Inertia.js and Vue.js.
  • Titanium (‚≠ê11) - Laravel front-end preset with Tailwind CSS, Inertia.js and Vue.js.

Resources / Packages

  • Kakunin (‚≠ê39) - Laravel package for real-time form validation.

Resources / Articles

  • Introducing Inertia.js
  • Server-side applications with client-side rendering
  • Inertia.js and Livewire: a high-level comparison
  • Handling authorization in a Laravel and Inertia.js application
  • Handling routes in a Laravel and Inertia.js application

Resources / Examples

  • Ping CRM / Rails (‚≠ê349) - Demonstration application made with Ruby on Rails and Vue.js.
